title: Barbecued citrus garlic prawns
ingredients: ['110ml (4 fl oz) olive oil', '1 tablespoon Dijon mustard', '3 cloves garlic, minced', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'juice of orange', '1 teaspoon dried basil, or to taste', '2 tablespoons white wine (optional)', '30 tiger or king prawns, peeled and deveined']
